DOC.brief_summary: This open label , single center , single oral dose , study PRT054021 , healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Human Phase I Absolute Bioavailability Study PRT054021 Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult men age 19 65 year old , inclusive BMI 1835 kg/m2 Clinically significant comorbid disease History substance abuse
